create_folders.name: create_folders
create_folders.text: create folders in our server file system were we will store your project
create_folders.title: create folders

start_clone.name: start_clone
start_clone.text: clone your project from git to our server file system
start_clone.title: start_clone

end_clone.name: end_clone
end_clone.text: checking if the clone task is done
end_clone.title: end clone

start_offline.name: start_offline
start_offline.text: use your code as a data-base to do a offline learning of the code
start_offline.title: start offline

end_offline.name: end_offline
end_offline.text: code studing in offline is done
end_offline.title: end offline

start_testing.name: start_testing
start_testing.text: run maven in the server to test you code and get failers of the code with maven and surfire
start_testing.title: start testing

end_testing.name: end_testing
end_testing.text: maven task was done and we have some file with discription of failers
end_testing.title: end testing

prepare_prediction.name: prepare_prediction
prepare_prediction.text: use all outputs from previous tasks to get pridction
prepare_prediction.title: prepare prediction

get_prediction.name: get_prediction
get_prediction.text: get a prediction of your code
get_prediction.title: get prediction
